name: Introduction to Interpersonal Communication
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of interpersonal communication. It covers topics such as self-disclosure, nonverbal communication, culture, and conflict resolution.

name: Interpersonal Listening
description: This course focuses on the process of listening in interpersonal communication. Students learn about different types of listening, active listening strategies, and the impact of effective listening.

name: Interpersonal Conflict Management
description: This course explores the process of managing conflict in interpersonal relationships. Students learn strategies for conflict avoidance, resolution, and communication.

name: Interpersonal Communication Theory
description: This course covers different theoretical perspectives on interpersonal communication. Students learn about the role of language, culture, and emotions in interpersonal communication.
